name: Shape Up (itch) (pinedajeremy)
description:
Team Rhombus

  • Programmer: Edward Stevenson
  • Level Designer: Jeremy Pineda
  • User Interface : Allen Altenor
  • QA: Badr Binmahfooz

"Shape Up" is a puzzle-platformer that revolves around creating a path to your goal by transforming cubes. Players do so by colliding with the desired cube. Cubes will rotate dependent on the side the player hit it. Controls:

Controls:

WASD - Move

MOUSE - Camera Movement

R - Restart

P - Pause

Notes: 

You can't jump. 

Known Bugs: 

Geometry is set up so that undesired movements can be made.
